title: Unconditional
lyrics:
[Intro: Justin Bieber & 
Cody Simpson
]
Oh, Oh
Your love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Our love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
[Verse 1: Cody Simpson]
Just when you think that, nothing is for certain
No lie behind the curtain, you just need to open your eyes
Just when you feel like, there's no more air to breathe in
Got nothing to believe in, it's like you can't control it
But there ain't no worry 'cause I got you, it ain't got nothing to do [?]
You praying to your girls that I call you, baby [?] at your phone now
[Chorus: Cody Simpson & 
Justin Bieber
]
I love you in the morning, I love you in the afternoon
I love you in the evening, baby, woah, yes I do
I love you in the morning, I love you in the afternoon (
Morning, Afternoon
I love you in the evening, baby (
evening, baby
)
Our love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Our love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
[Verse 2: Justin Bieber]
Just when you think that, you think the children are deserved
That my love was never worthy, you just need to reach out your hand
And just when you feel like, the weight is on your shoulder
And no ones there to hold you, bet feels like you can't control it
And there ain't no worry 'cause I got you, and It got nothing to do [?]
Praying [?] when I called you, and I ain't gon' stop now

[Chorus: Justin Bieber}
I love you in the morning, I love you in the afternoon (love you in the morning, love you in the afternoon)
I love you in the evening, baby, woah, yes I do
I love you in the morning, I love you in the afternoon (Morning, Afternoon)
I love you in the evening, baby (evening, baby)
Our love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Our love is unconditional
Oh, oh, oh, oh
[Outro]
Our love is unconditional
